text: Glendale Heights is a village in DuPage County, Illinois. It is a suburb of Chicago. At the 2020 census, the population was 33,176. The village was originally named Glendale. But in March 1960, the word Heights was added to the name because of the village's topographies. The village was incorporated in 1959. ==References== Category:Villages in Illinois Category:Suburbs of Chicago Category:Settlements in DuPage County, Illinois
title: Glendale Heights, Illinois
